concept.title: Updating Your Travel Profile
concept.shortdesc: Before you use Concur's travel application for the first time, update your Travel profile. Even if you make no changes, you must save your profile before you can book a trip in Travel.

conbody.note: Some companies have custom fields on this page. Check with your agency or Travel administrator if you need information on custom profile fields.
conbody.p: Use the Travel profile options to set or change your personal Travel preferences and settings. They include:

ul.li: Travel preferences (air, hotel, car rental, rail preferences)
